description: This file defines the TicketPackage model class in a Laravel application, including its properties, relationships, serialization, and search functionality.

classes.name: TicketPackage
classes.description: Eloquent model representing a ticket package with properties, relationships, and logging capabilities.

methods.name: ticket_sales
methods.description: Defines a one-to-many relationship with TicketSalePackage.

methods.name: events
methods.description: Defines a belongs-to relationship with Event.

methods.name: promotions
methods.description: Defines a one-to-many relationship with Promotion.

methods.name: serialize
methods.description: Serializes the TicketPackage object into an array, including promotions and auto-apply logic.

methods.name: toSearchableArray
methods.description: Returns an array suitable for search indexing, including name and price.

methods.name: getActivitylogOptions
methods.description: Configures activity logging options for the model.
